message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 45, and I'll take 55.  We can work out a better deal in the future if we both play it smart!
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be more equitable this round. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money, given the inflation we're both facing.  If we keep rejecting each other's offers, we risk getting nothing at all.
